name: Attack of the Bitmaps
description:
This game was made for KrassJam 12.

Most of the bitmaps were drawn by my 3yr old Nephew in paint.

Theme: A game where you fight bitmaps while holding your breath.

You run around a small room shooting bitmaps.

Controls

Right click: Slows enemies and gives you access to your gun for 15 seconds.

Left click: shoots gun
